body_html:
Hmm no I don't think we will be supporting something like this already. An implementation detail is that calling .forward will probably go around the JIT, and only module(...) will trigger it, so you might try. But as I said, it can break any moment.

Also, I wouldn't expect a noticeable speedup on this kind of model. It's quite small and GEMM-heavy, so there's not a lot of things we can optimize yet

body:
Hmm no I don't think we will be supporting something like this already. An implementation detail is that calling `.forward` will probably go around the JIT, and only `module(...)` will trigger it, so you might try. But as I said, it can break any moment.

Also, I wouldn't expect a noticeable speedup on this kind of model. It's quite small and GEMM-heavy, so there's not a lot of things we can optimize yet
